pages.title: Energy Converters
pages.text: Energy Converters is an energy bridge that adds blocks which can convert energy from one type to another. It's mainly used to convert RF to Forge Energy types of power.$(br2)Read more about Forge Energy $(l:modinformation/1_forgeenergy)Here$(/l)

pages.title: Documentation
pages.text: Energy Converters provide you 3 different Block Types:$(br)Energy Consumers, Energy Producers and the Energy Bridge.$(br2)The next pages will go over each block type and how they work.

pages.title: Energy Producer
pages.text: An Energy Producer will convert an energy to another type - just connect a cable or any machine to the producer and you are good to go.

pages.title: Energy Consumer
pages.text: The Energy Consumer will consume energy from an energy source and store it inside an adjacent Energy Bridge.

pages.title: Energy Bridge
pages.text: An energy bridge is used to store energy from a consumer and transfer it to a producer.$(br2)A single energy bridge supports up to 6 consumers and/or producers (1 per side) - but any consumer/producer may only connect to one bridge at a time
